beers.name: Estrella
beers.description: Estrella Damm is a Mediterranean beer, made with malt, rice and hop, brewed with 100% natural ingredients according to the original recipe from 1876.

beers.name: Guinness
beers.description: Irish Dry Stout style beer brewed by Guinness Ltd. in Dublin, Ireland. Guinness stout is made from water, barley, roast malt extract, hops, and brewer's yeast.

beers.name: Galway Hooker
beers.description: Galway Hooker is an excellent example of a Pale Ale; very complex and well balanced, fully flavoured with a great finish making it a highly refreshing and more-ish beer
